=Create New Language=

All the languages that come with the release are placed under [http://java-prettify.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/prettify/lang/package-summary.html prettify.lang] package. All languages should extends the [http://java-prettify.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/prettify/lang/Lang.html prettify.lang.Lang] class. You can take a look at [http://code.google.com/p/java-prettify/source/browse/trunk/src/prettify/lang/LangLisp.java prettify.lang.LangLisp] to see what should be done to make a new brush.

You can also submit the request as an issue to [http://code.google.com/p/google-code-prettify/issues/list].
